original_text: Every time that the king went to the Lord's temple, the guards carried the shields. After that, they took them back to the guards' room where they stored them.
korean_text: 왕이 여호와의 성전에 들어갈 때마다 시위하는 자가 그 방패를 들고 갔다가 시위소로 도로 가져갔더라

sentences.original_text: Every time that the king went to the Lord's temple
they took them back to the guards' room
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것들을 경비병들의 방으로 다시 가져갔다
